text: Ronald Eugene Rosser (October 24, 1929 - August 26, 2020) was a United States Army soldier. He was a recipient of the Medal of Honor for his actions in the Korean War. Rosser was born in Columbus, Ohio. Rosser died on August 26, 2020 at the age of 90.Medal of Honor Recipient Ronald E. Rosser Passes Away at 90 ==References== ==Other websites== * Ronald E. Rosser at the Victory Institute Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American military personnel of the Korean War Category:Military people from Ohio Category:People from Columbus, Ohio Category:United States Army Medal of Honor recipients
title: Ronald E. Rosser
